hero.title: The perfect template for your
hero.subtitle: Save weeks of development with our complete template. Authentication, database, admin dashboard, and more. All ready for production.

features.title: Everything you need included
features.subtitle: Don't waste time setting up. Our template includes all the essential functionalities for your modern application.

auth.title: Complete Authentication
auth.description: NextAuth v5 with Google, GitHub, email, and credential authentication. Email verification included.

admin.title: Admin Panel
admin.description: Complete dashboard to manage users, roles, and permissions. Tables with filters, pagination, and export.

database.title: Database
database.description: Prisma ORM configured with MongoDB. User, session, and token schemas already defined.

ui.title: UI Components
ui.description: Shadcn/ui + Tailwind CSS. Modern, accessible, and fully customizable components.

i18n.title: Internationalization
i18n.description: Multi-language support configured. Spanish and English included, easy to add more languages.

production.title: Production Ready
production.description: TypeScript, ESLint, Prettier configuration. Optimized for Vercel and other providers.

pricing.title: Simple pricing, infinite value
pricing.subtitle: One-time purchase, unlimited use on all your projects

requests.title: Service Requests
requests.description: Manage and monitor all service requests

step1.title: Select Client
step1.description: Choose the client for whom the request will be created
step1.label: Client *

step2.title: Select Location
step2.description: Choose where the service will be performed
step2.label: Location *
step2.noLocations: No locations found for this client

step4.title: Service Details
step4.noCustomFields: This service has no custom fields configured.

step5.title: Execution Date and Time
step5.description: Schedule when the service should be performed
step5.dateTimeRequired: Please select execution date and time
step5.futureRequired: Execution date must be in the future

messages.deleteConfirm: Are you sure? If the service has associated requests, it will be deactivated instead of deleted.
messages.deactivated: Service deactivated. It has associated requests and cannot be permanently deleted.

create.title: Create New Service
create.description: Add a new service to the catalog with a custom form.

basicCard.title: Service Information
basicCard.description: Basic details for the service that will appear in the catalog.

form.activeDescription: Service will be visible in the catalog
form.inactiveDescription: Service will be hidden from the catalog
form.serviceCodeDescription: 3-6 uppercase alphanumeric characters. Used for request IDs (e.g., REQ-LIMP-202602-0001)

validation.requiredFields: Please fill in all required fields
validation.atLeastOneField: Please add at least one field to the form

step1.title: Select Location
step1.description: Choose where the service will be performed

step3.title: Service Details
step3.noCustomFields: This service has no custom fields configured.
step3.uploadError: Some files could not be uploaded

step4.title: Execution Date and Time
step4.description: Schedule when the service should be performed
step4.dateTimeRequired: Please select execution date and time
step4.futureRequired: Execution date must be in the future

step5.title: Request Summary
step5.phaseCreatingDesc: We are registering your service request
step5.phaseUploadingDesc: We are uploading the attached files
step5.successDescription: Your request has been registered correctly.
step5.nextStep1: You will receive a notification when your request is assigned to a technician
step5.nextStep2: You can track the status of your request at any time
step5.nextStep3: The team will contact you if additional information is needed
step5.uploadError: Some files could not be uploaded

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.subtitle: Manage your notifications and stay updated with the latest activities.
notifications.noNotificationsDescription: You're all caught up! New notifications will appear here.
notifications.noMatchingFiltersDescription: Try adjusting your search criteria or clearing some filters.

analytics.title: Notification Analytics
analytics.description: Detailed insights and statistics about your notification activity.

filters.title: Filter Notifications
filters.advancedTip1: Use quotes for exact phrases: "system update"
filters.advancedTip2: Use OR for multiple terms: security OR urgent
filters.advancedTip4: Use type: to filter by type: type:security

preferences.title: Notification Preferences
preferences.subtitle: Customize how and when you receive notifications.

email.title: Email Notifications
email.description: Configure email notification settings and frequency.
email.frequencyDescription: How often you want to receive email notifications
email.typesDescription: Select which types of notifications you want to receive via email

push.title: Push Notification Preferences
push.description: Configure which types of push notifications you want to receive.
push.enableDescription: Allow push notifications for this account
push.typesDescription: Select which types of notifications you want to receive as push notifications
push.browserDescription: Manage your browser's push notification permissions and test functionality.
push.errorSubscribe: Failed to subscribe to push notifications
push.errorUnsubscribe: Failed to unsubscribe from push notifications
push.blocked: Push notifications are blocked. To enable them:
push.blockedStep1: 1. Click the lock icon in your browser's address bar
push.blockedStep3: 3. Refresh the page and try again
push.disabledInfo: Push notifications are disabled in your preferences. Enable them above to manage browser settings.

inApp.title: In-App Notifications
inApp.description: Configure notifications shown within the application.

quietHours.title: Quiet Hours
quietHours.description: Set times when you don't want to receive notifications.
quietHours.format: Time must be in HH:mm format

mentions.label: Mentions
mentions.description: When you are mentioned or tagged

REQUEST_CREATED.label: Request Created
REQUEST_CREATED.description: New service request has been created

REQUEST_ASSIGNED.description: Service request assigned to an employee

REQUEST_STATUS_CHANGED.description: Service request status has been updated

REQUEST_CANCELLATION_REQUESTED.label: Cancellation Requested
REQUEST_CANCELLATION_REQUESTED.description: Client requested cancellation of a service
